mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_id, r.customer_id, r.service_id, r.reservation_date, r.status FROM reservations r
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservations (reservation_id, customer_id, service_id, reservation_date, status) VALUES (#{id.value}, #{customerId.value}, #{serviceId.value}, #{reservationDate}, #{status, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler})
mapper.update: UPDATE reservations SET customer_id = #{customerId.value}, service_id = #{serviceId.value}, reservation_date = #{reservationDate}, status = #{status, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler} WHERE reservation_id = #{id.value}
